alert.note: Alert for Prince of Wales Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 20 at 7:53PM AKST until November 21 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...The following area, Prince of Wales. * WHEN...Until 145 AM AKST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 751 PM AKST, river gauge reports indicate rises in water levels from heavy rain in the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. - For Thorne River near Thorne Bay: At 7:00pm the stage was 13.17 feet. Flood Stage is 12.5 feet. At this height water should be flowing over the road upstream of the Thorne River Bridge.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
